document_data.mainbody:
Allan Redhand was an adventurer in the ruin of Spellgard.
Allan was not bright, and had little patience for social interaction and intrigues. He was happy following Devlins orders, not caring for the consequences.
Allan joined the Free Company of the Crescent after Devlin happened to save Allans sister. In 1479 DR, he went with his fellow to Spellgard hoping to find Lady Saharels treasures.
